00016 /*
00017 2014 May: btGeneric6DofSpring2Constraint is created from the original (2.82.2712) btGeneric6DofConstraint by Gabor Puhr and Tamas Umenhoffer
00018 Pros:
00019 - Much more accurate and stable in a lot of situation. (Especially when a sleeping chain of RBs connected with 6dof2 is pulled)
00020 - Stable and accurate spring with minimal energy loss that works with all of the solvers. (latter is not true for the original 6dof spring)
00021 - Servo motor functionality
00022 - Much more accurate bouncing. 0 really means zero bouncing (not true for the original 6odf) and there is only a minimal energy loss when the value is 1 (because of the solvers' precision)
00023 - Rotation order for the Euler system can be set. (One axis' freedom is still limited to pi/2)
00024 
00025 Cons:
00026 - It is slower than the original 6dof. There is no exact ratio, but half speed is a good estimation.
00027 - At bouncing the correct velocity is calculated, but not the correct position. (it is because of the solver can correct position or velocity, but not both.)
00028 */
00029 
00032 
00033 /*
00034 2007-09-09
00035 btGeneric6DofConstraint Refactored by Francisco Le?n
00036 email: projectileman@yahoo.com
00037 http://gimpact.sf.net
00038 */
00039

00059 enum RotateOrder
00060 {
00061         RO_XYZ=0,
00062         RO_XZY,
00063         RO_YXZ,
00064         RO_YZX,
00065         RO_ZXY,
00066         RO_ZYX
00067 };

00069 class btRotationalLimitMotor2
00070 {
00071 public:
00072 // upper < lower means free
00073 // upper == lower means locked
00074 // upper > lower means limited
00075         btScalar m_loLimit;
00076         btScalar m_hiLimit;
00077         btScalar m_bounce;
00078         btScalar m_stopERP;
00079         btScalar m_stopCFM;
00080         btScalar m_motorERP;
00081         btScalar m_motorCFM;
00082         bool     m_enableMotor;
00083         btScalar m_targetVelocity;
00084         btScalar m_maxMotorForce;
00085         bool     m_servoMotor;
00086         btScalar m_servoTarget;
00087         bool     m_enableSpring;
00088         btScalar m_springStiffness;
00089         bool     m_springStiffnessLimited;
00090         btScalar m_springDamping;
00091         bool     m_springDampingLimited;
00092         btScalar m_equilibriumPoint;
00093 
00094         btScalar m_currentLimitError;
00095         btScalar m_currentLimitErrorHi;
00096         btScalar m_currentPosition;
00097         int      m_currentLimit;
00098 
00099         btRotationalLimitMotor2()
00100         {
00101                 m_loLimit                = 1.0f;
00102                 m_hiLimit                = -1.0f;
00103                 m_bounce                 = 0.0f;
00104                 m_stopERP                = 0.2f;
00105                 m_stopCFM                = 0.f;
00106                 m_motorERP               = 0.9f;
00107                 m_motorCFM               = 0.f;
00108                 m_enableMotor            = false;
00109                 m_targetVelocity         = 0;
00110                 m_maxMotorForce          = 0.1f;
00111                 m_servoMotor             = false;
00112                 m_servoTarget            = 0;
00113                 m_enableSpring           = false;
00114                 m_springStiffness        = 0;
00115                 m_springStiffnessLimited = false;
00116                 m_springDamping          = 0;
00117                 m_springDampingLimited   = false;
00118                 m_equilibriumPoint       = 0;
00119 
00120                 m_currentLimitError   = 0;
00121                 m_currentLimitErrorHi = 0;
00122                 m_currentPosition     = 0;
00123                 m_currentLimit        = 0;
00124         }
00125 
00126         btRotationalLimitMotor2(const btRotationalLimitMotor2 & limot)
00127         {
00128                 m_loLimit                = limot.m_loLimit;
00129                 m_hiLimit                = limot.m_hiLimit;
00130                 m_bounce                 = limot.m_bounce;
00131                 m_stopERP                = limot.m_stopERP;
00132                 m_stopCFM                = limot.m_stopCFM;
00133                 m_motorERP               = limot.m_motorERP;
00134                 m_motorCFM               = limot.m_motorCFM;
00135                 m_enableMotor            = limot.m_enableMotor;
00136                 m_targetVelocity         = limot.m_targetVelocity;
00137                 m_maxMotorForce          = limot.m_maxMotorForce;
00138                 m_servoMotor             = limot.m_servoMotor;
00139                 m_servoTarget            = limot.m_servoTarget;
00140                 m_enableSpring           = limot.m_enableSpring;
00141                 m_springStiffness        = limot.m_springStiffness;
00142                 m_springStiffnessLimited = limot.m_springStiffnessLimited;
00143                 m_springDamping          = limot.m_springDamping;
00144                 m_springDampingLimited   = limot.m_springDampingLimited;
00145                 m_equilibriumPoint       = limot.m_equilibriumPoint;
00146 
00147                 m_currentLimitError   = limot.m_currentLimitError;
00148                 m_currentLimitErrorHi = limot.m_currentLimitErrorHi;
00149                 m_currentPosition     = limot.m_currentPosition;
00150                 m_currentLimit        = limot.m_currentLimit;
00151         }
00152 
00153 
00154         bool isLimited()
00155         {
00156                 if(m_loLimit > m_hiLimit) return false;
00157                 return true;
00158         }
00159 
00160         void testLimitValue(btScalar test_value);
00161 };

00165 class btTranslationalLimitMotor2
00166 {
00167 public:
00168 // upper < lower means free
00169 // upper == lower means locked
00170 // upper > lower means limited
00171         btVector3 m_lowerLimit;
00172         btVector3 m_upperLimit;
00173         btVector3 m_bounce;
00174         btVector3 m_stopERP;
00175         btVector3 m_stopCFM;
00176         btVector3 m_motorERP;
00177         btVector3 m_motorCFM;
00178         bool      m_enableMotor[3];
00179         bool      m_servoMotor[3];
00180         bool      m_enableSpring[3];
00181         btVector3 m_servoTarget;
00182         btVector3 m_springStiffness;
00183         bool      m_springStiffnessLimited[3];
00184         btVector3 m_springDamping;
00185         bool      m_springDampingLimited[3];
00186         btVector3 m_equilibriumPoint;
00187         btVector3 m_targetVelocity;
00188         btVector3 m_maxMotorForce;
00189 
00190         btVector3 m_currentLimitError;
00191         btVector3 m_currentLimitErrorHi;
00192         btVector3 m_currentLinearDiff;
00193         int       m_currentLimit[3];
00194 
00195         btTranslationalLimitMotor2()
00196         {
00197                 m_lowerLimit         .setValue(0.f , 0.f , 0.f );
00198                 m_upperLimit         .setValue(0.f , 0.f , 0.f );
00199                 m_bounce             .setValue(0.f , 0.f , 0.f );
00200                 m_stopERP            .setValue(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.2f);
00201                 m_stopCFM            .setValue(0.f , 0.f , 0.f );
00202                 m_motorERP           .setValue(0.9f, 0.9f, 0.9f);
00203                 m_motorCFM           .setValue(0.f , 0.f , 0.f );
00204 
00205                 m_currentLimitError  .setValue(0.f , 0.f , 0.f );
00206                 m_currentLimitErrorHi.setValue(0.f , 0.f , 0.f );
00207                 m_currentLinearDiff  .setValue(0.f , 0.f , 0.f );
00208 
00209                 for(int i=0; i < 3; i++) 
00210                 {
00211                         m_enableMotor[i]            = false;
00212                         m_servoMotor[i]             = false;
00213                         m_enableSpring[i]           = false;
00214                         m_servoTarget[i]            = btScalar(0.f);
00215                         m_springStiffness[i]        = btScalar(0.f);
00216                         m_springStiffnessLimited[i] = false;
00217                         m_springDamping[i]          = btScalar(0.f);
00218                         m_springDampingLimited[i]   = false;
00219                         m_equilibriumPoint[i]       = btScalar(0.f);
00220                         m_targetVelocity[i]         = btScalar(0.f);
00221                         m_maxMotorForce[i]          = btScalar(0.f);
00222                         
00223                         m_currentLimit[i]     = 0;
00224                 }
00225         }
00226 
00227         btTranslationalLimitMotor2(const btTranslationalLimitMotor2 & other )
00228         {
00229                 m_lowerLimit          = other.m_lowerLimit;
00230                 m_upperLimit          = other.m_upperLimit;
00231                 m_bounce              = other.m_bounce;
00232                 m_stopERP             = other.m_stopERP;
00233                 m_stopCFM             = other.m_stopCFM;
00234                 m_motorERP            = other.m_motorERP;
00235                 m_motorCFM            = other.m_motorCFM;
00236                 
00237                 m_currentLimitError   = other.m_currentLimitError;
00238                 m_currentLimitErrorHi = other.m_currentLimitErrorHi;
00239                 m_currentLinearDiff   = other.m_currentLinearDiff;
00240 
00241                 for(int i=0; i < 3; i++) 
00242                 {
00243                         m_enableMotor[i]            = other.m_enableMotor[i];
00244                         m_servoMotor[i]             = other.m_servoMotor[i];
00245                         m_enableSpring[i]           = other.m_enableSpring[i];
00246                         m_servoTarget[i]            = other.m_servoTarget[i];
00247                         m_springStiffness[i]        = other.m_springStiffness[i];
00248                         m_springStiffnessLimited[i] = other.m_springStiffnessLimited[i];
00249                         m_springDamping[i]          = other.m_springDamping[i];
00250                         m_springDampingLimited[i]   = other.m_springDampingLimited[i];
00251                         m_equilibriumPoint[i]       = other.m_equilibriumPoint[i];
00252                         m_targetVelocity[i]         = other.m_targetVelocity[i];
00253                         m_maxMotorForce[i]          = other.m_maxMotorForce[i];
00254 
00255                         m_currentLimit[i]     = other.m_currentLimit[i];
00256                 }
00257         }
00258 
00259         inline bool isLimited(int limitIndex)
00260         {
00261                 return (m_upperLimit[limitIndex] >= m_lowerLimit[limitIndex]);
00262         }
00263 
00264         void testLimitValue(int limitIndex, btScalar test_value);
00265 };

00267 enum bt6DofFlags2
00268 {
00269         BT_6DOF_FLAGS_CFM_STOP2 = 1,
00270         BT_6DOF_FLAGS_ERP_STOP2 = 2,
00271         BT_6DOF_FLAGS_CFM_MOTO2 = 4,
00272         BT_6DOF_FLAGS_ERP_MOTO2 = 8
00273 };
00274 #define BT_6DOF_FLAGS_AXIS_SHIFT2 4 // bits per axis

00357         btScalar getAngle(int axis_index) const { return m_calculatedAxisAngleDiff[axis_index]; }
00358

00360         btScalar getRelativePivotPosition(int axis_index) const { return m_calculatedLinearDiff[axis_index]; }

00369         void setAngularLowerLimit(const btVector3& angularLower)
00370         {
00371                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++) 
00372                         m_angularLimits[i].m_loLimit = btNormalizeAngle(angularLower[i]);
00373         }
00374 
00375         void setAngularLowerLimitReversed(const btVector3& angularLower)
00376         {
00377                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++) 
00378                         m_angularLimits[i].m_hiLimit = btNormalizeAngle(-angularLower[i]);
00379         }
00380 
00381         void getAngularLowerLimit(btVector3& angularLower)
00382         {
00383                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++) 
00384                         angularLower[i] = m_angularLimits[i].m_loLimit;
00385         }
00386 
00387         void getAngularLowerLimitReversed(btVector3& angularLower)
00388         {
00389                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00390                         angularLower[i] = -m_angularLimits[i].m_hiLimit;
00391         }
00392 
00393         void setAngularUpperLimit(const btVector3& angularUpper)
00394         {
00395                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00396                         m_angularLimits[i].m_hiLimit = btNormalizeAngle(angularUpper[i]);
00397         }
00398 
00399         void setAngularUpperLimitReversed(const btVector3& angularUpper)
00400         {
00401                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00402                         m_angularLimits[i].m_loLimit = btNormalizeAngle(-angularUpper[i]);
00403         }
00404 
00405         void getAngularUpperLimit(btVector3& angularUpper)
00406         {
00407                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00408                         angularUpper[i] = m_angularLimits[i].m_hiLimit;
00409         }
00410 
00411         void getAngularUpperLimitReversed(btVector3& angularUpper)
00412         {
00413                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00414                         angularUpper[i] = -m_angularLimits[i].m_loLimit;
00415         }
00416 
00417         //first 3 are linear, next 3 are angular
00418 
00419         void setLimit(int axis, btScalar lo, btScalar hi)
00420         {
00421                 if(axis<3)
00422                 {
00423                         m_linearLimits.m_lowerLimit[axis] = lo;
00424                         m_linearLimits.m_upperLimit[axis] = hi;
00425                 }
00426                 else
00427                 {
00428                         lo = btNormalizeAngle(lo);
00429                         hi = btNormalizeAngle(hi);
00430                         m_angularLimits[axis-3].m_loLimit = lo;
00431                         m_angularLimits[axis-3].m_hiLimit = hi;
00432                 }
00433         }
00434 
00435         void setLimitReversed(int axis, btScalar lo, btScalar hi)
00436         {
00437                 if(axis<3)
00438                 {
00439                         m_linearLimits.m_lowerLimit[axis] = lo;
00440                         m_linearLimits.m_upperLimit[axis] = hi;
00441                 }
00442                 else
00443                 {
00444                         lo = btNormalizeAngle(lo);
00445                         hi = btNormalizeAngle(hi);
00446                         m_angularLimits[axis-3].m_hiLimit = -lo;
00447                         m_angularLimits[axis-3].m_loLimit = -hi;
00448                 }
00449         }
00450 
00451         bool isLimited(int limitIndex)
00452         {
00453                 if(limitIndex<3)
00454                 {
00455                         return m_linearLimits.isLimited(limitIndex);
00456                 }
00457                 return m_angularLimits[limitIndex-3].isLimited();
00458         }
00459 
00460         void setRotationOrder(RotateOrder order) { m_rotateOrder = order; }
00461         RotateOrder getRotationOrder() { return m_rotateOrder; }
00462 
00463         void setAxis( const btVector3& axis1, const btVector3& axis2);
00464 
00465         void setBounce(int index, btScalar bounce);
00466 
00467         void enableMotor(int index, bool onOff);
00468         void setServo(int index, bool onOff); // set the type of the motor (servo or not) (the motor has to be turned on for servo also)
00469         void setTargetVelocity(int index, btScalar velocity);
00470         void setServoTarget(int index, btScalar target);
00471         void setMaxMotorForce(int index, btScalar force);
00472 
00473         void enableSpring(int index, bool onOff);
00474         void setStiffness(int index, btScalar stiffness, bool limitIfNeeded = true); // if limitIfNeeded is true the system will automatically limit the stiffness in necessary situations where otherwise the spring would move unrealistically too widely
00475         void setDamping(int index, btScalar damping, bool limitIfNeeded = true); // if limitIfNeeded is true the system will automatically limit the damping in necessary situations where otherwise the spring would blow up
00476         void setEquilibriumPoint(); // set the current constraint position/orientation as an equilibrium point for all DOF
00477         void setEquilibriumPoint(int index);  // set the current constraint position/orientation as an equilibrium point for given DOF
00478         void setEquilibriumPoint(int index, btScalar val);
00479 
00480         //override the default global value of a parameter (such as ERP or CFM), optionally provide the axis (0..5). 
00481         //If no axis is provided, it uses the default axis for this constraint.
00482         virtual void setParam(int num, btScalar value, int axis = -1);
00483         virtual btScalar getParam(int num, int axis = -1) const;
00484     
00485     static btScalar btGetMatrixElem(const btMatrix3x3& mat, int index);
00486     static bool matrixToEulerXYZ(const btMatrix3x3& mat,btVector3& xyz);
00487     static bool matrixToEulerXZY(const btMatrix3x3& mat,btVector3& xyz);
00488     static bool matrixToEulerYXZ(const btMatrix3x3& mat,btVector3& xyz);
00489     static bool matrixToEulerYZX(const btMatrix3x3& mat,btVector3& xyz);
00490     static bool matrixToEulerZXY(const btMatrix3x3& mat,btVector3& xyz);
00491     static bool matrixToEulerZYX(const btMatrix3x3& mat,btVector3& xyz);
00492 };

00495 struct btGeneric6DofSpring2ConstraintData
00496 {
00497         btTypedConstraintData m_typeConstraintData;
00498         btTransformFloatData m_rbAFrame;
00499         btTransformFloatData m_rbBFrame;
00500 
00501         btVector3FloatData m_linearUpperLimit;
00502         btVector3FloatData m_linearLowerLimit;
00503         btVector3FloatData m_linearBounce;
00504         btVector3FloatData m_linearStopERP;
00505         btVector3FloatData m_linearStopCFM;
00506         btVector3FloatData m_linearMotorERP;
00507         btVector3FloatData m_linearMotorCFM;
00508         btVector3FloatData m_linearTargetVelocity;
00509         btVector3FloatData m_linearMaxMotorForce;
00510         btVector3FloatData m_linearServoTarget;
00511         btVector3FloatData m_linearSpringStiffness;
00512         btVector3FloatData m_linearSpringDamping;
00513         btVector3FloatData m_linearEquilibriumPoint;
00514         char               m_linearEnableMotor[4];
00515         char               m_linearServoMotor[4];
00516         char               m_linearEnableSpring[4];
00517         char               m_linearSpringStiffnessLimited[4];
00518         char               m_linearSpringDampingLimited[4];
00519         char               m_padding1[4];
00520 
00521         btVector3FloatData m_angularUpperLimit;
